name: Vaibhav Bajpai
content: Vaibhav Bajpai | Homepage Prof. Dr. Bajpai home . people . papers . teaching Prof. Dr. Vaibhav Bajpai Hasso Plattner Institute 14482 Potsdam, Germany [email protected] Secretariat: Svenja Fenn [email protected] Google Scholar People Postdoctoral Fellows: Dr. Newton Masinde . Dr. Sonal Khosla . Dr. Vasilis Ververis PhD Students: Robert Richter . Jan Riedler Student Assistants: Kahira Kalbhor . Johannes Peters Jannis Hajda . Felix Hoffmann . Ingunn Fløvig Masters Students: Kevin Klein . Jakob Bork Leadership Lead Organiser: 2021 Dagstuhl #21272 2018 Dagstuhl #18412 PC Chair: 2024 PAM 2021 TMA Recent Service PC Member: 2026 IMC 2025 IMC 2024 IMC 2024 USENIX NSDI complete list → Recent Teaching 2025/26 Lecture Course: Introduction to Internet Measurements 2025/26 Lecture Course: Technical and Legal Responses to Internet Hate Crimes 2025/26 Project Seminar: Reproducing Internet Measurement Research 2025/26 Masters Project: Detecting and Countering Online Hate Speech 2025 Lecture Course: Modern and Secure Internet: Design and Operations 2025 Project Seminar: Trends in Internet Measurements complete list → Tools doe-hunter → A tool to discover, query, and analyze DDR and encrypted DNS protocols. aviator → A drone traffic generator. dtube-app → An Android app to compare the video streaming performance of a decentralised video streaming service (DTube) and YouTube wepr → A tool designed for the SamKnows probes to measure web latency and web complexity metrics. It offloads Javascript execution to a parsing server to measure rendering performance. weblar → A tool designed for the MONROE probes to measure web latency, above the fold (ATF) and rendering performance. youtube → A tool to measure youtube performance on the command line. simweb → A tool to measure similarity of webpages delivered over IPv4 and IPv6 nfql → An implementation of the network flow query language (NFQL) happy → A happy eyeballs [RFC 6555] probing tool ncclient → A Python library for NETCONF clients. I am looking for Postdocs and PhD Students. Hasso Plattner Institute + University of Potsdam, Germany Professor and Head of the Research Group: Data-intensive Internet Computing Co-Speaker of the Research School: Secure Distributed Computing timeline → Research Awards 2023IFIP Networking 2023 Best Paper Award 2019Best of CCR award at ACM SIGCOMM 2019 2018ACM SIGCOMM 2018 Best Paper Award 2017IEEE CNOM Best Dissertation Award at IM 2017 Teaching Awards 2020 Preis für die beste Lehre 2019 (Award for Best Teaching) Awarded by the Faculty of Computer Science, Technische Universität München Research Themes Internet Architecture TON'19 SIGCOMM CCR'17 NETWORKING'15 PAM'15 Secure and Privacy-Enhancing Technologies IMC'22 PETS'25 TNSM'24 PAM'26 SIGCOMM CCR'23 PAM'22 PAM'21 Internet Resiliency SIGCOMM CCR'22 TNSM'24 NETWORKING'23 Digital Sovereignty TOIT'22 IC-CS'22 NETWORKING'21 NETWORKING'20 Internet Routing and Congestion SIGCOMM'18 COMMAG'19 NETWORKING'22 PAM'18 Web and Video Content Delivery INFOCOM'20 TNSM'22 TNSM'19 PAM'19 NETWORKING'24 NETWORKING'18 Networked Mobility IMC'22 MOBICOM'18 INFOCOM'21 COMST'22 TMC'21 T-ITS'22 Internet Infrastructure, Operations and Management SIGCOMM CCR'17 TNSM'21 TNSM'17 NETWORKING'23 NETWORKING'22 Internet Sustainability and Reproducibility SIGCOMM CCR'19 SIGCOMM CCR'22 SIGCOMM CCR'18 Internet Measurement Platforms and IETF Standardisation COMST'15 SIGCOMM CCR'15 RFC 8194 Recent Publications The Future of DNS Privacy: A Comparison of DNS over QUIC and DNS over HTTP/3 P Bielefeld, F.
